          <title>
            <string language="en">How yoghurt is made</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Joghurt gebildet wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment du yaourt est fait</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como o yoghurt é feito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come il yogurt è fatto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς το γιαούρτι γίνεται</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo se hace el yogur</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how yoghurt is prepared from small amount of live yoghurt and ultra heat-treated milk.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">live yoghurt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">micro-organisms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">UHT milk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yoghurt</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie Joghurt aus etwas 
Phasenjoghurt und ultra wärmebehandelter Milch vorbereitet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment du yaourt est 
préparé à partir d'un peu de yaourt de phase et de lait ultra 
soumis à un traitement thermique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como o yoghurt é preparado 
de um pouco de yoghurt vivo e de leite ultra heat-treated.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come il yogurt è preparato 
dalla piccola quantità di yogurt in tensione e di latte ultra 
trattato termicamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς το γιαούρτι 
προετοιμάζεται από το μικρό ποσό ζωντανού γιαουρτιού και 
εξαιρετικά υποβαλλόμενου σε θερμοθεραπεία γάλακτος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo el yogur está 
preparado de cantidad pequeña de yogur vivo y de leche ultra sometida
a un tratamiento térmico.</string>
          </description>
